analysis.description:
TitsToken.sendToBeneficiaryContract (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#389-394) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiaryContract.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#391-392)

ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#62-70) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#65)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#73-83) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#77-78)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#78)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#88-114) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#96-103)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#116-167) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#124-136)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#142-153)

MintableToken.IsMintingGoal (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#199-208) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- mintingFinished == false || alreadyMintedOnce == false || goalReached == false
	- mintingFinished == false || alreadyMintedOnce == false || goalReached == false

mintingFinished == false || alreadyMintedOnce == false || goalReached == false

analysis.description:
MintableToken.refund (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#304-322) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-totalSupply.sub(balances[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#315)

MintableToken.maxMintingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#180)
MintableToken.mintingGoal should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#180-182)
MintableToken.titsTokenAuthor should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#182-185)
TitsToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#324)
TitsToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#323)
TitsToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x07ec6c3159c2336ba36ab41f73411f8fee430470.sol#323-324)
